summary: The Drone Espionage Act (S. 1809) aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the taking or transmitting of video of defense information. The bill, introduced in the Senate in May 2025, specifically focuses on adding 'video' to the existing prohibition on photographing or creating photographic negatives of such information, thus expanding the scope of what is considered illegal espionage related to defense information.
